content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5) and small-electric-pole(position x=8.5, y=9.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a wooden chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Boiler at position(x=-6.0, y=24.5)
Consists of boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump at position(x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with unknown position and unknown connections

### Pipe group at position(x=-9.5, y=23.5)
Consists of pipe group with fluid system 74030 and pipes at positions (x=-9.5,y=23.5),(x=-8.5,y=23.5),(x=-8.5,y=22.5),(x=-7.5,y=22.5),(x=-6.5,y=22.5)

### Electricity group at unknown position
Consists of electricity group with id 44619 and poles at positions (x=8.5,y=9.5),(x=0.5,y=10.5),(x=2.5,y=2.5),...,(x=-3.5,y=14.5),(x=-3.5,y=18.5),(x=-3.5,y=22.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors when trying to connect entities with pipes
 -  Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected with pipes
 -  Ensure that the pipe connections are valid and not blocked by other entities

### Errors when trying to insert items into entities
 -  Ensure that the entity has enough space to hold the items
 -  Ensure that the items are available in the inventory

### Errors when trying to get entities at specific positions
 -  Ensure that the entity exists at the specified position
 -  Ensure that the entity is of the correct type

### Errors when boiler is out of fuel
 -  Ensure that the boiler has a fuel source
 -  Ensure that the fuel source is not empty

### Errors when offshore pump is not working
 -  Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a valid fluid system
 -  Ensure that the offshore pump has a valid connection point

### Errors when generator is not connected
 -  Ensure that the generator is connected to a valid electricity group
 -  Ensure that the generator has a valid connection point

### Errors when inserter is out of fuel
 -  Ensure that the inserter has a fuel source
 -  Ensure that the fuel source is not empty

### Errors when lab has no research in progress
 -  Ensure that the lab has a valid research item
 -  Ensure that the lab has enough resources to conduct research

### Errors when furnace has no ingredients to smelt
 -  Ensure that the furnace has a valid ingredient to smelt
 -  Ensure that the furnace has enough resources to smelt the ingredient

### Errors when burner mining drill is out of fuel
 -  Ensure that the burner mining drill has a fuel source
 -  Ensure that the fuel source is not empty

### Errors when no coal in inventory
 -  Ensure that coal is available in the inventory
 -  Ensure that the coal is not being used by another entity
